description: At Malva, we harness ultrasonic radio waves to penetrate deep into your skin layers, inducing a disruptive vibration...
additionalInfo: Experience body contouring without anesthesia, scars, or downtime. Let Malva's Skincare Experts recommend targeted solutions...

faq.question: What are the benefits of body sculpting?
faq.answer: Improve Skin Texture, Enhance Body Tone and Shape, Define and Customize Curves...

faq.question: Does body contouring work?
faq.answer: Clients typically notice a reduction in circumference within a few sessions...

faq.question: What is the difference between body sculpting and Cool Technologies?
faq.answer: Ultrasonic cavitation employs ultrasound frequencies, while Cool Technologies use cold temperatures...

faq.question: How frequently do I need body sculpting treatments?
faq.answer: Typically every 7-10 days, depending on treatment area and goals...
